/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Street lamps and signs punctuate the scene, hinting at the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of scale to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
